Name: Ghost Killers The Revenge of the Sucker-Fun
About the game: You will not just play but you'll live the story of three youtubers after revealing to the world on national television that the clown Amendoim had a dangerous spirit incarnated within. These Three Youtubers decide to rest and take a vacation at the campsite but to their surprise bizarre things are happening and supernatural events want their soul embodied a dull spirit in all. Just like the series and the movie this is the first game that mixes horror and comedy , blood and jokes Get crazy playing this game!... explore many different types of scenery and environments fight zombies, spirits and the evil spirit itself You can choose to play with three characters with different gameplay and personalities. And how about taking a really crazy test drive Third person game. Three guys with different types of trinkets that shoot. you can also use sniper trinkets or even use melee weapons to end the spirits
